title: Gifts In Bloom Live Mini Yellow Rose Bush Wicker Gift Basket - 4 Inch Indoor Plant
features: GARDEN FRESH: Straight from our farm to your garden, our wide array of live plants arrive ready to display!
APARTMENT-FRIENDLY: Our miniature plants are a convenient size and make wonderful additions to any indoor or balcony garden
REPEAT BLOOMS: Our Mini Rose Bush blooms year-round and is sure to add freshness and color wherever it is planted
EASY TO GROW: No greenthumb No problem. Our resilient miniature rose bush is easy to grow and maintain, making it a great choice for both gardening novices and experts alike
FLOWER POWER: Our farm fresh potted plants are no one-hit wonders - give the gift that continuously blooms!
description: Growing green has never been so easy! Our wide variety of live plants are delivered to your door ready to plant, fresh from our farm to your garden, and are always sure to add color and freshness to any living space.Our Mini Rose Bush arrives in its own grow pot, and is completely ready to transfer to garden soil (it also makes a great trailer or trellis climber!) or a permanent indoor or outdoor container. Our Mini Rose Bush's shipping container is 17 x 7 x 7 in diameter, requires a bright, sunny living space and regular watering to reach their full potential and thrive in their environment, however, they are very hardy plants that are easy to grow, making them a great choice for both the novice and the experienced gardener.Give the gift that continuously blooms! Our large array of live plants makes it easy to choose a personalized gift for the greenthumb in your life, no matter the occasion. Rose bushes are ready to plant.
